remarks: Each entry of a matrix with an index as permutation of the other is an element of the underlying ring.  (Contributed by AV, 1-Jan-2019.)
statement:
matepmcl.a $e |- A = ( N Mat R ) $.
matepmcl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` A ) $.
matepmcl.p $e |- P = ( Base ` ( SymGrp ` N ) ) $.
matepmcl $p |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ Q e. P /\ M e. B ) -> A. n e. N ( ( Q ` n ) M n ) e. ( Base ` R ) ) $.
$d B n $.
$d M n $.
$d P n $.
$d Q n $.
$d R n $.
